name.label: Queue Name
name.description: The name of the SQS queue

delay_seconds.label: Delay Seconds
delay_seconds.description: The time in seconds that the delivery of all messages in the queue will be delayed

max_message_size.label: Max Message Size
max_message_size.description: The limit of how many bytes a message can contain before Amazon SQS rejects it

message_retention_period.label: Message Retention Period
message_retention_period.description: The length of time, in seconds, for which Amazon SQS retains a message

receive_message_wait_time_seconds.label: Receive Message Wait Time
receive_message_wait_time_seconds.description: The time for which a ReceiveMessage call will wait for a message to arrive

visibility_timeout_seconds.label: Visibility Timeout
visibility_timeout_seconds.description: The visibility timeout for the queue

fifo_queue.label: FIFO Queue
fifo_queue.description: Whether this is a FIFO queue

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: JSON string of tags to apply
